title: RP purchase issue
body: RP PURCHASE ARE NOT SUCCESSFULLY , THERE IS AN ISSUE WHEN I DID MY PAYMENT. BUT MY BANK ACCOUNT SHOWS PENDING

replies.body:
If you're having billing-related issues, definitely bring them up to our Player Support Billing Team, and they can get any issues squared away!

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

Hey there,

Are you still experiencing issues?
